name: Bike-sell Website
details: This is a Bike-sell responsive website
full_details: This is a bike selling simple website here I use simple html css and javascript.

name: Tourism related Website
details: It's a tourism related react js project
full_details: It's a travel related website here you can book your favourite place that you want to travel. Here I use html, css, bootstrap, node JS, react JS, mongo Db, exparess JS, firebase, and so one. Here you can book or delete your booking place

name: Watch-sell Website
details: It's a watch selling full-stack web site
full_details: It's a watch-selling full-stack website. Here I make both admin and user pannel. User can order a product that's add his ordered list. And to order a product a user must login first. An user can delete his ordered product. Admin can add a new product, Delete a product, cancel user order , add new admin and Update status pending to approved.

name: Football Website Demo
full_details: It's a Football website here I use some simple but awesome futures . Here I use Html, css , javascript and bootstrap. And it's also responsive .

name: Medical Website Demo
details: It's a medical hospital react js website
full_details: It's a medical hospital website here i create total 5 pages, and each page looking awesome. Here i use react js, react router, firebase authentication system. If user want to check details a service or Department section and Our Doctor section it's redirect to login page and after login it's redirect those page that actually he/she want to go.It's also a responsive website
